definition: crushed or broken rock, stone etc
to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: By means of high - temperature curing, the curing period of lime - fly ash stabilized bound macadam is shortened.
sentences.chinese: 通过高温养生手段缩短二灰稳定碎石的养生龄期。

sentences.english: This engineering is change fill macadam.
sentences.chinese: 本工程为换填级配碎石。

sentences.english: This name for the MacAdam building principle is still in use today.
sentences.chinese: 这个名称的碎石建设原则，是目前仍在使用的。

sentences.english: The window looked down on the gravel road stretching south.
sentences.chinese: 窗外，一条碎石路向南延伸。

sentences.english: Groaning, William twisted against the debris inside the guard table.
sentences.chinese: 桌下，威廉在碎石中扭动着，呻吟着。

sentences.english: We were on the ground floor and when I came to I was lying under a pile of rubble.
sentences.chinese: 我们当时都在第一层，我发现我躺在一堆碎石块下。

sentences.english: Sift the gravel and put the larger stones in another pile.
sentences.chinese: 筛出碎石，把大点的石头堆成一堆。

sentences.english: The machine cancrunch the rock up.
sentences.chinese: 这台机器可作碎石之用。

sentences.english: The gravel under their wheels was new and smoothly raked.
sentences.chinese: 在它们轮子下的碎石还是新铺的，耙得很均匀。

sentences.english: His prize-winning book is called Moy Sand and Gravel.
sentences.chinese: 他获奖的作品名叫《沙与碎石》。

sentences.english: A wrecked car is found among the rubble in Kesennuma, Japan.
sentences.chinese: 一辆失事车辆在碎石堆里被发现，日本気仙沼。

sentences.english: However, the bridge is not perfectly straight and optimistic, broken stones and thistles and thorns are paved .
sentences.chinese: 但，桥本身并非通直豁达，也有碎石和荆棘铺成的。

sentences.english: This paper provides an experiment basis for studying mechanism of geobelt reinforced crushed gravel soil further.
sentences.chinese: 为进一步研究土工带素碎石土加筋机理提供试验基础。

sentences.english: Such parts could damage stone-crushing machines, vibratory equipment, or wood-chipping machines.
sentences.chinese: 这些部分可能损害碎石机，振动设备，或木材切削机。

sentences.english: I walked along the lake gravel.
sentences.chinese: 我沿着湖边的碎石路走去。

sentences.english: It is a common phenomenon that lime-fly-ash stabilized-aggregates acts as the base and subbase of highways.
sentences.chinese: 二灰碎石作为各类公路的基层和底基层已是普遍现象。

definition: Shenkeng township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
